section.title:
quantity on hand
by zone
zones
quantity on hand for Quantities on Hand by Zone
section.para: To view quantities on hand (QOH) by zone, select the Quantities on Hand by Zone option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying QOH by zone, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify zone whose QOH you want to display. Displays QOH for selected zone.
